title: Prior Assessment and Feedback Strategies in MOOC-Based Climate Change Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental climate change concepts and scientific data interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Climate change MOOC conducted in a smartphone-based learning environment, targeting high school students preparing for professional careers

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core concepts related to climate change by over 80% in post-assessments
Learners can develop personalized learning plans based on pre-assessment results
Learners show a 70% or higher improvement in intention to continue learning after completing the course

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
